comment.author: 33399017@N06
comment._content: Penso que seja o Restelo do Belenenses, com a vista do Tejo.

comment.author: 23679934@N07
comment._content: O nome oficial é Estádio do Restelo inaugurado em 23 de Setembro de 1956 com o nome de Estádio Almirante Américo Thomaz

comment.author: 23492747@N04
comment._content: Superb photograph - Belenenses FC's ground, St Jeronimo's monastery and Belem Tower all in one photo.  Was the Discoveries Monument not yet built at this time?

comment.realname: Biblioteca de Arte / Art Library Fundação Calouste Gulbenkian
comment.author: 26577438@N06
comment._content:
Berkshire,
the Discoveries Monument was built in 1940

comment._content: Oi! Sou administrador de um grupo chamado Um pastel em Belém e nós adoraríamos ter isto adicionado ao grupo!

comment._content: Ah right, ok, it must be out of the picture to the left a little; I have only been there once, so the geography is not quite clear in my memory!
